title: Several senior female Labour MPs drop out of party deputy leader contention
summary: The search for a successor to Angela Rayner is being expedited due to a compressed timeline and concerns over a potentially toxic political environment. These factors have significantly narrowed the candidates vying for her position. The urgency highlights the challenges within the party as it seeks stable leadership amid ongoing issues.

title: Belarus v Scotland: World Cup 2026 qualifying Group C – live
summary: Steve Clarke's team is seeking their first win in the group stage against the 97th-ranked team in the world. The matchup has the potential for an unexpected upset. Follow Michael Butler's minute-by-minute report for updates.

title: House Democrats share Trump ‘birthday note’ to Jeffrey Epstein – live updates
summary: Democrats on the House Oversight Committee have released a scanned copy of a note compiled in an album of messages celebrating Jeffrey Epstein's 50th birthday. The release aims to shed light on the connections of various figures to Epstein. This move aligns with ongoing investigations into Epstein's activities and those associated with him.

title: ‘Afraid of nothing’: Thomas Tuchel sure England are ready for Belgrade bearpit
summary: The head coach expresses confidence that his young team will meet the challenge of competing against a motivated Serbia. They will be facing this test at the formidable Rajko Mitic Stadium. The match is expected to be a significant challenge for the squad.
